channel.title: MITB/MPSC Song Project
channel.description:
I have finished the preparation of a new MPSC/MITB community project.
What we will be doing is singing to a song (like the we are the world project, except i started preparation for this before that was released :P)
Anyone can sign up, you are required to sing a part of a song that will be pmed to you. You must have a webcam with your face visible singing the song, if you ware not comfortable with your face being visible, do not sign up.
We need mitb 'elitists' and moderators/admins, so please sign up!
Rules:
1. Webcam with you face visible 2. Sing the correct lyrics 3. Do not tell anyone else your part, this will make the end product more fun
Definite, Possible Signed up: - Lesterknome - Lin - Tico

i refuse to be in a song/video with moparscapers

he could really use your good look and charm in his video frank_
and im sure you have a lovely singing voice

Stop dick hopping, maminerr.
[/quote]
Anyone who is anyone in this community would know that i wouldnt touch frank with a 10ft pole and make stupid remarks like the one above as a joke because he hates my guts.[/quote]
All I said was stop dick hopping. No asked for your opinion on frank.
Lose your immaturity.
[P.S.: Nobody asked you to get on my dick ;)]

What we will be doing is singing to a song (like the we are the world project, except i started preparation for this before that was released :P)

Anyone can sign up, you are required to sing a part of a song that will be pmed to you. You must have a webcam with your face visible singing the song, if you ware not comfortable with your face being visible, do not sign up.
